title: An Architecture-Led Hybrid Report on Body Language Detection Project
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: This report provides an architecture-led analysis of two modern vision-language models (VLMs), Qwen2.5-VL-7B-Instruct and Llama-4-Scout-17B-16E-Instruct, and explains how their architectural properties map to a practical video-to-artifact pipeline implemented in the BodyLanguageDetection repository
